title: Got my gift notification, but didn't receive a gift?
body: Hi there. When I logged in this morning, I received a notification saying I received a gift for good behavior in 2014, clicked "Awesome," but can't find anything in the gifting center/my gifting history/account etc. Am I to go through all my champions and see if I got a new skin? That doesn't seem right.

replies.body:
When the box came up telling you you'd received a gift it should have also had the skin name on there.  Anyway, I can see you got Dragonslayer Vayne.

:D
May you please let me know what Mystery Skin i received? I have no clue where to find it :(
I don't see one on your account yet.  They're still going out though.
Can you tell me what i got.
Sanguine Garen
i got mystery gifted a skin and im not sure what i got my ign: liveandreloaded
Way to nerco a super old thread hahaha.  If you look at your purchases in the client it should show you what you got.
I just got two of these messages recently on login. Nothing is showing up in my purchases on client and the name of the skin I got wasn't shown on the notification :O
Yeah, same for me. What even is that? I recently bought rp and some Red Revel Things but i do not know why i got 2 gifts, cant see which ones tho ;/
Im on the new client and i got a notification on the top right for a reward box or something. I looked almost everywhere to see where i could open it or see if i have one.

Right? I got a top notification with the mystery box icon but i could not see what it was because it disappeared so fast. now i have looked in my history and still cant find it. I don't even know why i got it or Who gave it to me
What did I get
I also receive a gift from a friend this morning but when i opened it, it only had a message, so i don't know what my friend send me can you help me?
I didn't receive mine either. and I've looked multiple times for about an hour.
You got Leopard Nidalee. :D
Can u tell me what I got. I'm so confused...
I don't think it was a mystery gift.
nvm i found it
i had  the same problem
Can you tell me what skin i got? didnt see it and now cant find it

hey holly i got the msg when i log in but the name disappeared so fast not sure what i got i think said corki but i look at my skins and i still only had 2 i had before can u check on it for me plz and ty
Dragonwing Corki
Is there a reason why i didn't get one? o.O if so can i get a message why.
Well, they aren't all out yet.  PATIENCE MAN!
Heh, woman~
Ah ok, Was just wondering because all my friends got one, even one who had a few accounts banned, so i just felt like. ;a; just wanted to make sure i didn't do anything wrong. lol
Hey can you tell me what I got? I saw the notification but I wasn't paying attention. :(
Yeah today when I got on, I got a thing in the top right saying I got a gift but I have no idea what I got. Can some one help me.

same here i got a message that said i recieved a skin from my friend but can't find it out could you help me guys {{item:3070}} and for the elophante i won't work anymore for me and thanks for your time
I also had this problem but it said that my friend gifted me something and then the popup disappeared and i cant seem to find what i've been gifted can you tell me what i got?
Hey holly could you tell me what skin i got,i have alot and im not sure wich one i got
its 2/1 and still no skin yet -.-
I also had a mystery gift show up but did not say what I got any help would be appreciated and thanks for the gift.

For a fast and easy way of finding out which skin you got (if you have a small amount of skins), use the Elophant client's "Save owned skins" feature. 
> http://www.elophant.com/league-of-legends/champion-select 

You'll be able to see a list of all of the skins you have. For instance, here are my skins: 
>http://www.elophant.com/league-of-legends/summoner/na/45372498/skins

Otherwise, you can always ask Riot Games Player Support about what you received in your mystery box: 
>https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new
I have same problem....i received a notification but no skin , could u tell me why ? :) please
**i got same problem i received a notification but no skin can u tell me what i got?**
